artist: Artist: Pat Hui; Author: Nalan Singde
creditline: Gift of funds from Virginia Kremen in memory of Dr. Arnold Kremen
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: two images with Chinese text on small left image and English translation at right; horizontal bands of color with spots and white areas--greens, pruple, pinks, yellow; some vertical elements at right side of left image
dimension:
13 7/8 x 9 5/16 in. (35.24 x 23.65 cm) (image, left image)
17 9/16 x 18 3/16 in. (44.61 x 46.2 cm) (image, right image)
20 x 39 15/16 in. (50.8 x 101.44 cm) (mount)
medium: Watercolor and metallic ink pen on paper
title: Flying catkins, drifting and broken, have become duck weeds, from a set of 24 poems
